price: 17. Kijken ze niet naar de kamelen en hoe zij geschapen worden?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
